entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
